text: Are CTA images necessary for emails? Or is there a way we can use the CTA tracking and apply the styling in the template vs the cta button editor shown here <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/ctas/create-calls-to-action-ctas> Thank you

as far as I know, cta's automatically get converted to an image on ctas for email. I had to deal with this a while back. I had to set up a little design board in Figma so my marketers could create button graphics with the text they needed to use for emails
so if you have a text CTA that pulls in css to make it look like you want, it doesn't get pulled over into the email
